biotools.summary:
TWO-SIGMA (TWO-component SInGle cell Model-based Association method) and TWO-SIGMA-G (TWO-SIGMA based Geneset Testing) is a novel two-component single cell model-based association method for single-cell RNA-seq data.

twosigma is an R package for differential expression (DE) analysis and gene set testing (GST) in single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-seq) data.

bioschemas.name: TWO-SIGMA

twosigma is an R package for differential expression (DE) analysis and gene set testing (GST) in single-cell RNA-seq (scRNA-seq) data.
